Interface AccumuloClient.ConnectionOptions<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AccumuloClient.ClientFactory<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:

    Enclosing interface:
    AccumuloClient
    public static interface AccumuloClient.ConnectionOptions<T>
extends AccumuloClient.ClientFactory<T>
    Build methods for connection options
    Since:
    2.0.0
